name: azurite
description: An open source Azure Storage API compatible server

azurite.debug.description: Enable debug log into Visual Studio Code channel

azurite.silent.description: Disable access log into Visual Studio Code channel

azurite.loose.description: Enable loose mode which ignores unsupported headers and parameters

azurite.cert.description: Path to a locally-trusted pem or pfx certificate file path to enable HTTPS mode

azurite.key.description: Path to a locally-trusted pem key file, required when cert points to a pem file

azurite.pwd.description: Password for pfx file, required when cert points to a pfx file

azurite.location.description: Workspace location folder path (can be relative or absolute). By default, in the VS Code extension, the currently opened folder is used. If launched from the command line, the current process working directory is the default. Relative paths are resolved relative to the default folder.

azurite.blobHost.description: Blob service listening endpoint, by default 127.0.0.1

azurite.blobPort.description: Blob service listening port, by default 10000

azurite.queueHost.description: Queue service listening endpoint, by default 127.0.0.1

azurite.queuePort.description: Queue service listening port, by default 10001

azurite.tableHost.description: Table service listening endpoint, by default 127.0.0.1

azurite.tablePort.description: Table service listening port, by default 10002

azurite.skipApiVersionCheck.description: Skip the request API version check, request with all Api versions will be allowed.

azurite.disableProductStyleUrl.description: Disable getting account name from the host of request Uri, always get account name from the first path segment of request Uri.

azurite.inMemoryPersistence.description: Disable persisting any data to disk. All data is stored in memory. If the Azurite (node) process is terminated or VS Code is closed, all data is lost.

azurite.extentMemoryLimit.description: When using in-memory persistence, limit the total size of extents (blob and queue content) to a specific number of megabytes. Defaults to 50% of total memory.

scripts.docker:build: npm run docker:prebuild && cross-var docker build --no-cache --rm -f "Dockerfile" -t xstoreazurite.azurecr.io/public/azure-storage/azurite:$npm_package_version . && cross-var docker tag xstoreazurite.azurecr.io/public/azure-storage/azurite:$npm_package_version xstoreazurite.azurecr.io/public/azure-storage/azurite:latest
scripts.docker:build:internal: npm run docker:prebuild && cross-var docker build --no-cache --rm -f "Dockerfile" -t xstoreazurite.azurecr.io/internal/azure-storage/azurite:$npm_package_version . && cross-var docker tag xstoreazurite.azurecr.io/internal/azure-storage/azurite:$npm_package_version xstoreazurite.azurecr.io/internal/azure-storage/azurite:latest
scripts.test: npm run lint && cross-env NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 mocha --compilers ts-node/register --no-timeouts --grep @loki --recursive --exit tests/**/*.test.ts tests/**/**/*.test.ts
scripts.test:in-memory: npm run lint && cross-env AZURITE_TEST_INMEMORYPERSISTENCE=1 NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 mocha --compilers ts-node/register --no-timeouts --grep @loki --recursive --exit tests/**/*.test.ts tests/**/**/*.test.ts
scripts.test:blob: npm run lint && cross-env NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 mocha --compilers ts-node/register --no-timeouts --grep @loki --recursive --exit tests/blob/*.test.ts tests/blob/**/*.test.ts
scripts.test:blob:in-memory: npm run lint && cross-env AZURITE_TEST_INMEMORYPERSISTENCE=1 NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 mocha --compilers ts-node/register --no-timeouts --grep @loki --recursive --exit tests/blob/*.test.ts tests/blob/**/*.test.ts
scripts.test:blob:sql: npm run lint && cross-env cross-env NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 AZURITE_TEST_DB=mysql://root:my-secret-pw@127.0.0.1:3306/azurite_blob_test mocha --compilers ts-node/register --no-timeouts --grep @sql --recursive --exit tests/blob/*.test.ts tests/blob/**/*.test.ts
scripts.test:blob:sql:ci: npm run lint && cross-env cross-env NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 AZURITE_TEST_DB=mysql://root:my-secret-pw@127.0.0.1:13306/azurite_blob_test mocha --compilers ts-node/register --no-timeouts --grep @sql --recursive --exit tests/blob/*.test.ts tests/blob/**/*.test.ts
scripts.test:queue: npm run lint && cross-env NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 mocha --compilers ts-node/register --no-timeouts --recursive --exit tests/queue/*.test.ts tests/queue/**/*.test.ts
scripts.test:queue:in-memory: npm run lint && cross-env AZURITE_TEST_INMEMORYPERSISTENCE=1 NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 mocha --compilers ts-node/register --no-timeouts --recursive --exit tests/queue/*.test.ts tests/queue/**/*.test.ts
scripts.test:table: npm run lint && cross-env NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 mocha --compilers ts-node/register --no-timeouts --recursive --exit tests/table/**/*.test.ts
scripts.test:table:in-memory: npm run lint && cross-env AZURITE_TEST_INMEMORYPERSISTENCE=1 NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 mocha --compilers ts-node/register --no-timeouts --recursive --exit tests/table/**/*.test.ts
scripts.test:exe: npm run lint && cross-env NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 mocha --compilers ts-node/register --no-timeouts tests/exe.test.ts --exit
scripts.test:linux: npm run lint && cross-env NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 mocha --compilers ts-node/register --no-timeouts tests/linuxbinary.test.ts --exit
scripts.clean: rimraf dist typings *.log coverage __testspersistence__ temp __testsstorage__ .nyc_output debug.log *.vsix *.tgz
scripts.validate:npmpack:win: npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build && npm pack && cross-var npm install -g azurite-$npm_package_version.tgz && azurite -v && azurite-blob -v && azurite-queue -v && azurite-table -v
scripts.validate:npmpack:linux_mac: npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build && npm pack && cross-var sudo npm install -g azurite-$npm_package_version.tgz && azurite -v && azurite-blob -v && azurite-queue -v && azurite-table -v

author: Microsoft
